description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Drip Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Drip Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, add choc melts and cream to a saucepan over very low heat. Stir constantly until chocolate is melted and smooth. Allow to cool and thicken slightly, then pour over the chilled cake, allowing it to dribble over the side a little. Top with chocolate-dipped strawberries.
